TopicTitle: "Auto : Orbital View" is Displayed When Loading a Save with an Orbital Craft No Matter the View That Was Saved/is Active.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

How to Replicate:

  1. Have a simple craft in orbit (Because I have no idea how docked vessels affects the view display)
  2. Set to an obvious view like Chase or Capture
  3. Save
  4. Load
  5. Test for actual view that is active

Note:
That "Auto : Orbital View" is displayed.
"Auto : Orbital View" is NOT the correct view. The correct view is STILL active as it was when the game was saved.

Additional Information:
There is no display at all of what view is active when landed. Tested on the Mun and on Kerbin.
